description:
To make highly informed decisions quickly, organizational leaders need to be able to access and interpret data in real-time. Information, and the ability to decipher and act on it swiftly, has become a competitive differentiator and by using the techniques explained in this course we can dazzle the stakeholders and beat our rivals. This course mainly focuses on unique features of MS Excel such as data validation and filtering techniques, Flash fill techniques and interactive formatting of data tables.

The industries and functional specializations such as Information Technology, administration, accounting, Finance, Marketing, Operations, Human Resource Management, Health care benefit the most by using these dazzling Excel tools
title: Operational Challenges with Data in Excel - Demystified
